title: Electric eel
data:

| electric eel S [![Electric eel.png](/images/f/f9/Electric_eel.png)](/File:Electric_eel.png) |                                                                                                           |
| ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| [HP](/Hit_points "Hit points")                                                              | 10-22                                                                                                     |
| [HD](/Hit_dice "Hit dice")                                                                  | 3                                                                                                         |
| [XP](/XP "XP")                                                                              | 53                                                                                                        |
| [Speed](/Monster_speed "Monster speed")                                                     | 10                                                                                                        |
| [AC](/Armour_class "Armour class")                                                          | 1                                                                                                         |
| [EV](/Evasion "Evasion")                                                                    | 15                                                                                                        |
| [Will](/Willpower "Willpower")                                                              | 10                                                                                                        |
| [Resistances](/Resistance "Resistance")                                                     | [rElec+++](/Electricity "Electricity") [rDrown](/Asphyxiation "Asphyxiation")                             |
| [Vulnerabilities](/Vulnerability "Vulnerability")                                           | None                                                                                                      |
| [Habitat](/Habitat "Habitat")                                                               | Water                                                                                                     |
| [Intelligence](/Monster_intelligence "Monster intelligence")                                | [Animal](/Category:Animal_intelligence "Category:Animal intelligence")                                    |
| [Uses](/Item_usage "Item usage")                                                            | [Uses nothing](/Category:Uses_nothing "Category:Uses nothing")                                            |
| [Holiness](/Holiness "Holiness")                                                            | [Natural](/Category:Natural_holiness "Category:Natural holiness")                                         |

|   |                                                                 |
| - | --------------------------------------------------------------- |
|   | A type of fish capable of generating a powerful electric field. |

## Contents

- [1 Useful Info](#Useful_Info)
- [2 Spells](#Spells)
- [3 Tips & Tricks](#Tips_.26_Tricks)
- [4 History](#History)

## Useful Info

**Electric eels** are a dangerous aquatic creature that attacks from afar using bolts of [electricity](/Electricity "Electricity"). They are often encountered in the watery areas of [the Dungeon](/The_Dungeon "The Dungeon") and [the Lair](/The_Lair "The Lair").

## Spells

| Spell set I |                                                             |                                                      |
| :---------- | ----------------------------------------------------------- | ---------------------------------------------------- |
| Slot1       | [Electrical Bolt](/Electrical_Bolt "Electrical Bolt") (3d6) | [Natural flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags") |

## Tips & Tricks

- Simply charging at electric eels is unwise. Their Electrical Bolt deals significant damage, ignores 1/2 of your AC, can bounce off of walls to [hit you twice](/Doublezap "Doublezap"). It's rare to have rElec this early in the game, and they often appear in small groups.

- Eels cannot traverse outside water, and like all monsters, cannot attack when outside your [line of sight](/Line_of_sight "Line of sight"). So, by keeping the eel at the edge of your LOS, you can safely pelt it with ranged attacks. If the fight goes poorly, retreat - it can't chase you on land.

- Certain [wands](/Wand "Wand") are particularly effective against electric eels:

  - [Wand of flame](/Wand_of_flame "Wand of flame"): When a wand of flame passes over water, it creates damaging [steam](/Steam "Steam") clouds. Eels don't have much HP, so the steam alone is often enough to kill the eel outright.
  - [Wand of mindburst](/Wand_of_mindburst "Wand of mindburst"): Often deals enough damage to kill an eel, even at 0 Evocations skill.
  - [Wand of polymorph](/Wand_of_polymorph "Wand of polymorph"): Won't kill, but they can turn eels into other [amphibious](/Amphibious "Amphibious") monsters.

* The other wands are effective, but you'll usually want to save them for a target more important than an electric eel.

- If all else, just walk away. Eels can't leave water, so you can [exclude](/Exclude "Exclude") any tile near water to avoid fighting eels. If you're caught out in the open, a [scroll of fog](/Scroll_of_fog "Scroll of fog") or [scroll of fear](/Scroll_of_fear "Scroll of fear") can give time to escape.

## History

- Prior to [0.6](/0.6 "0.6"), these monsters were called electric**al** eels. This was simply a misnomer.

Electric eel

From CrawlWiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Version 0.31: This article may not be up to date for the latest stable release of Crawl.
electric eel S 
HP 10-22
HD 3
XP 53
Speed 10
AC 1
EV 15
Will 10



Resistances rElec+++
rDrown
Vulnerabilities None
Habitat Water
Intelligence Animal
Uses Uses nothing
Holiness Natural
Size Small
Type electric eel, electric eel
Flags Cold-blooded
No gen derived
A type of fish capable of generating a powerful electric field.

Contents

  • 1 Useful Info
  • 2 Spells
  • 3 Tips & Tricks
  • 4 History

Useful Info

Electric eels are a dangerous aquatic creature that attacks from afar using bolts of electricity. They are often encountered in the watery areas of the Dungeon and the Lair.

Spells

Spell set I
Slot1 Electrical Bolt (3d6) Natural flag

Tips & Tricks

  • Simply charging at electric eels is unwise. Their Electrical Bolt deals significant damage, ignores 1/2 of your AC, can bounce off of walls to hit you twice. It's rare to have rElec this early in the game, and they often appear in small groups.
  • Eels cannot traverse outside water, and like all monsters, cannot attack when outside your line of sight. So, by keeping the eel at the edge of your LOS, you can safely pelt it with ranged attacks. If the fight goes poorly, retreat - it can't chase you on land.
  • Certain wands are particularly effective against electric eels:
    • Wand of flame: When a wand of flame passes over water, it creates damaging steam clouds. Eels don't have much HP, so the steam alone is often enough to kill the eel outright.
    • Wand of mindburst: Often deals enough damage to kill an eel, even at 0 Evocations skill.
    • Wand of polymorph: Won't kill, but they can turn eels into other amphibious monsters.
The other wands are effective, but you'll usually want to save them for a target more important than an electric eel.
  • If all else, just walk away. Eels can't leave water, so you can exclude any tile near water to avoid fighting eels. If you're caught out in the open, a scroll of fog or scroll of fear can give time to escape.

History

  • Prior to 0.6, these monsters were called electrical eels. This was simply a misnomer.

rawPage:
{{version031}}
{{monster info}}

==Useful Info==
'''Electric eels''' are a dangerous aquatic creature that attacks from afar using bolts of [[electricity]]. They are often encountered in the watery areas of [[the Dungeon]] and [[the Lair]].

{{monster spells}}

==Tips & Tricks==
*Simply charging at electric eels is unwise. Their Electrical Bolt deals significant damage, ignores 1/2 of your AC, can bounce off of walls to [[doublezap|hit you twice]]. It's rare to have rElec this early in the game, and they often appear in small groups.
*Eels cannot traverse outside water, and like all monsters, cannot attack when outside your [[line of sight]]. So, by keeping the eel at the edge of your LOS, you can safely pelt it with ranged attacks. If the fight goes poorly, retreat - it can't chase you on land.
*Certain [[wand]]s are particularly effective against electric eels:
**[[Wand of flame]]: When a wand of flame passes over water, it creates damaging [[steam]] clouds. Eels don't have much HP, so the steam alone is often enough to kill the eel outright.
**[[Wand of mindburst]]: Often deals enough damage to kill an eel, even at 0 Evocations skill.
**[[Wand of polymorph]]: Won't kill, but they can turn eels into other [[amphibious]] monsters.
:The other wands are effective, but you'll usually want to save them for a target more important than an electric eel.
*If all else, just walk away. Eels can't leave water, so you can [[exclude]] any tile near water to avoid fighting eels. If you're caught out in the open, a [[scroll of fog]] or [[scroll of fear]] can give time to escape.

==History==
*Prior to [[0.6]], these monsters were called electric'''al''' eels. This was simply a misnomer.
